email_body: Deathly afraid doesn't even come close to describing it. Busy tonight. How bout tomorrow? From: Margaret Allen@ENRON on 10/24/2000 06:25 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: Okay, since you are deathly afraid of being nice to me, now about we go to grab a beer or dinner tomorrow night? Does that work for you?
